dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 813 IH: Funding is Zero for Zero Nutrition Options (FIZZ-NO) Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Self introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to prohibit the use of supplemental nutrition assistance program benefits to purchase soda.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Funding is Zero for Zero Nutrition Options (FIZZ-NO) Act of 2025.
Section 3 of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 2012) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (k) by inserting soda, after alcoholic beverages,, and
by inserting after subsection (r) the following:

subsection.text: Soda means a carbonated beverage that contains more than 1 gram of added sugar, artificial sweetener, or flavoring per serving.

section.text: This Act shall take effect 180 days after the date of the enactment of this Act.
